author: Julio Perea
title: Celebration of C2C Scholarship - Saint Mary's Today
text:
On Friday, July 25th , we invite the entire Saint Mary’s community to celebrate the accomplishments of our Countdown to College (C2C) students during the annual Celebration of C2C Scholarship event in Aquinas Hall at 10:30am . Students will showcase the results of their hard work and learning this Friday in the main level of Aquinas Hall on the Winona campus. The Year 4 students will be presenting research they’ve been working on for B100: Watershed Ecology, with each poster presentation unique to the student and the environments of their home cities. Along with their presentations, our Juniors, Sophomores, and Freshmen will also be presenting some of the projects they’ve been working on, which include: eBook Creator projects in Academic Writing, clocks in Wood Shop, and short films and skits in Theatre! Please come support our students and enjoy refreshments and snacks
C2C is an academic summer camp at Saint Mary’s for rising 9th-12th graders that prepares first-gen high school students to explore college as an option and prepares them for academic success. This year we welcomed 68 students from partner schools all over the country, including Arizona, Montana, Illinois, Wisconsin, and Minnesota! Each summer they participate in classes taught by SMUMN and visiting faculty members from other institutions, go on field trips, and personal development activities to help them prepare for college and give them insight on opportunities that could further their education.
If you are interested in learning more about the Countdown to College program please reach out to c2c@smumn.edu .

author: Amirah Keaton
title: Art, jewelry command highest sales values in 2024: 1stDibs
text:
Furniture remains the platform’s largest category by volume, though art and jewelry command the highest sales values in 2024. Image credit: 1stDibs
Online design marketplace 1stDibs has released its 2024 Luxury E-commerce Report, revealing how art and jewelry have become dominant categories in high-value transactions.
The report, which analyzes consumer activity across key verticals—furniture, art, jewelry and apparel—spotlights shifting preferences among luxury shoppers. As the digital marketplace continues to grow, furniture remains the platform’s largest category by volume, though art and jewelry command the highest sales values, according to data from 1stDibs.
“Until just a decade or so ago, when the contemporary art market soared, Impressionist works by the movement’s masters were considered the bluest of blue-chip art,” said Anthony Brazilay Freund, editorial director at 1stDibs, in a statement.
“One hundred fifty years after the founding of Impressionism, high-powered collectors and avid art lovers of lesser means are once again entranced by the brilliance and exuberance that characterizes these game-changing creations.”
Shoppers prioritize investment-worthy pieces
Standout transactions involving blue-chip artworks and rare jewelry pieces reflect the growing consumer desire for collectible and investment-worthy items.
Impressionism proved popular. Notable examples include the sale of Russian-born painter Marc Chagall’s “Four Tales from the Arabian Nights, 1948” and American artist Yvonne Thomas’ “The Tower, 1954.”
Though contemporary and modern styles topped the sales list, Impressionist works rose two positions to third place in 2024.
Top 1stDibs sales of 2024. Image credit: 1stDibs
Art and jewelry align with the interests of affluent buyers, who are increasingly prioritizing these purchases as high-yield investments. The platform shares that jewelry’s top sale for the year was a 7-carat cushion-cut diamond ring, listed at $1 million.
Apparel and accessories also set records. Orders for handbags from Bottega Veneta grew by 76 percent year-over-year, while orders for Hermès handbags grew by 57 percent year-over-year in 2024.
Additionally, designer John Galliano’s newsprint dress for Christian Dior, as seen in “Sex and The City,” is officially one of 1stDibs’ most viewed fashion listings, raking in more than 200,000 views to date.
“Hermès continues to be the most sought-after luxury handbag creator in the world, effectively leveraging its reputation for superior craftsmanship and slow, deliberately limited production to drive competition among aficionados for its creations,” said Mr. Freund, for the report.
“The relative ease of acquiring Hermès pieces on the secondary market makes 1stDibs an important destination for these shoppers, not least because 1stDibs has a constantly evolving selection of special-edition and rare items from the brand that are typically available only to the house’s VIP clients.”
Decor trends gain ground
As digital adoption accelerates in the luxury sector, 1stDibs remains well-positioned ( see story ), with a curated selection of high-value items and a focus on emerging consumer priorities ( see story ).
While art and jewelry supersede other categories by value, furniture continues to be a cornerstone of the marketplace, driven by iconic pieces such as Eames Lounge Chairs and lighting fixtures designed by Gio Ponti.
The online design marketplace’s Luxury E-Commerce Report analyzes activity across art, home and apparel and accessories. Image credit: 1stDibs
“Art Deco pieces from the 1920s and ’30s continue to appeal because they are elegantly anchored in the modern — streamlined forms, simplified ornamentation — while looking back to the craftsmanship and creativity that graces the best antiques,” said Mr. Freund, for the report.
“Characterized by the use of exceptionally fine materials, Art Deco reached its pinnacle in iconic works by such French makers as Jules Leleu, Jean-Michel Frank and Charles Dudouyt.”

author: aglae.
title: cento posti di lavoro persi presso il pi\u00f9 grande datore di lavoro privato del dipartimento
text:
Dopo lo stupore, sono la rabbia e l'incomprensione a dominare Valéo. “Durante il nostro ultimo incontro con la direzione si è parlato di 35 tagli di posti di lavoro. Siamo quindi rimasti molto sorpresi nell'apprendere che 100 posti di lavoro dirigenziali e tecnici stavano per scomparire”, commenta Chantal Jouve, rappresentante sindacale della CGT all'interno dell'azienda, insieme a La Tribune-Le Progrès.
“È come togliere i polmoni in fabbrica”
Giovedì sono stati menzionati 868 licenziamenti a livello nazionale (dati gestionali, ndr) negli otto siti francesi del fornitore automobilistico, di cui un centinaio nel sito di Brivadois. Il sindacato Force Ouvrière, da parte sua, annuncia 1.282 dei 13.500 dipendenti che lavorano nell'azienda in tutta la Francia.
Secondo Chantal Jouve, la decisione è inconcepibile soprattutto perché la fabbrica San-Florin realizza profitti. La confederazione interprofessionale precisa anche nel suo volantino: “Il produttore francese di attrezzature automobilistiche ha raggiunto i suoi obiettivi con un margine operativo del 3,8% sul fatturato rispetto al 3,2% del 2022”. “Con l'eliminazione dei dirigenti, è come togliere i polmoni”. la fabbrica. È controproducente e porterà irrevocabilmente a una reazione a catena”, aggiunge Chantal Jouve.
“Cercheremo di fare pressione sulla dirigenza”
In seguito alle decisioni prese dalla direzione riguardo alla soppressione di 100 posti di lavoro nel sito di Sainte-Florine
il più grande datore di lavoro privato dell'Alta Loira con 600 dipendenti, la CGT ha deciso di convocare l'intersindacato questo venerdì 29 novembre. “L’obiettivo è raggiungere un accordo tra i diversi gruppi per difendere i dipendenti. In due anni, 2000 persone hanno lasciato l'azienda e questo non è normale”, reagisce Chantal Jouve. “Cercheremo di fare pressione sulla dirigenza. »
Nel corso della manifestazione prevista alle ore 9,30 verranno distribuiti volantini da parte dei dirigenti sindacali eletti. “Chiediamo a tutti i dipendenti di essere vigili e di aderire a tutte le azioni che la CGT o l'intersindacato proporranno”, si legge nella brochure.
Contattata, la direzione di Valéo Sainte-Florine non ha risposto alla nostra chiamata.[France](/tag/France)

author: Staff Report
title: Pakistan to receive modern agricultural machinery from Russia to boost crop yields
text:
ISLAMABAD: Russia on Thursday agreed to supply modern agricultural machinery to Pakistan in an effort to boost crop yields and improve agricultural productivity.
This was announced by Russian Deputy Minister of Industry and Trade, Aleksei Gruzdev, during a meeting with Pakistan’s Minister for Industries, Production, and National Food Security, Rana Tanveer Hussain, in Islamabad.
Both ministers emphasized the need for balanced trade relations between the two countries. Rana Tanveer underscored the importance of modernizing Pakistan’s agricultural sector, stating that the government would provide all necessary support to Russian investors.
Additionally, Pakistan and Russia have signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) aimed at enhancing bilateral cooperation in the areas of trade and economy. The MoU signing ceremony was attended by Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Senator Ishaq Dar and Russian Deputy Prime Minister Alexei Overchuk.
The agreement between the Pakistan Mercantile Exchange (PMEX) and the Saint Petersburg International Mercantile Exchange (SPIMEX) was signed by PMEX Acting Managing Director Farhan Tahir and SPIMEX President Igor Artemyev. Furthermore, Pakistan has joined the MoU on the Creation and Development of the International Transport Corridor, linking Belarus, Russia, Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, Afghanistan, and Pakistan.

author: archyde
title: Tours from Europe bases | Stars and Stripes
text:
Delft Pottery Workshop: A Hands-On Experience​ in the Netherlands Calling all art enthusiasts and travel⁣ lovers!‍ SHAPE ⁢Trips and Tours is offering ⁢a unique opportunity ⁣to delve into the world of Dutch pottery with a ⁢special workshop and lunch experience at the Royal Delft Museum on February 22nd.
Imagine yourself in the heart of Delft, surrounded by the rich history and artistry of this renowned pottery ⁣tradition. ⁢You’ll have the chance to learn from skilled artisans, get your hands dirty, and​ create your own unique piece of Delftware.
The workshop⁣ promises a hands-on experience, guiding you through the entire process, from shaping the clay to decorating⁤ your creation. It’s a ​chance⁤ to unleash your creativity and take ⁤home a tangible souvenir of your trip to‍ the Netherlands.
After your creative ​journey, you’ll enjoy a delicious lunch at the Royal Delft Museum, surrounded by the museum’s stunning collection of historic Delftware.⁤ This immersive ‌experience combines the joy⁤ of making‌ art with the pleasure of exploring Dutch culture and history.
This is more than ​just⁢ a workshop; it’s a chance to connect with a centuries-old tradition,learn new⁣ skills,and ⁣create lasting memories.
Explore Europe ⁢with Military Base⁤ Tours Planning a European adventure? Base ‌tours offer an accessible way for members of the military community to experience exciting destinations. ⁤ Here’s a glimpse of upcoming trips and⁢ opportunities ⁢to immerse ‌yourself in different cultures.
Belgium
SHAPE Trips and Tours is providing a variety of excursions,starting with a visit to Cologne on January‌ 25th. You’ll enjoy a guided tour exploring the city’s historical‌ landmarks and architectural marvels, including the iconic Cologne ⁣Cathedral.​
The‍ programme continues with a pottery workshop and a ‌delightful lunch at the Royal Delft Museum in Delft, ‌Netherlands,‍ on February 22nd. History and art enthusiasts can indulge in a ⁤parfum​ workshop in⁣ Paris ⁢on March 8th. ⁤ For those seeking a longer trip,
SHAPE Trips and Tours is also organizing a 5-day adventure to ‍Spain from March 12th to 16th.
For inquiries and bookings, call⁣ 06544-3884,⁤ email shapetripsandtours1@gmail.com, or explore their website at www.shape2day.com. Germany
Discover the beauty⁣ of the German Alps and Austrian countryside with Ansbach Outdoor Recreation. Embark on an invigorating journey to Oberstdorf​ on ⁤February 8th or March 22nd, with trips priced between $99 and $139.
For a picturesque escape, explore the charming town of Lermoos (Austria) on March 8th. Adults can enjoy the experience for $139, ⁢while children aged⁢ 16-18 can join for $109 and children aged 5-15 for $99.
Conclude your adventure with a thrilling 4-day trip to Saalbach hinterglenn (Austria) from March 27th to 30th. Adults‍ can join for $429 and children for $329.
Adventure Awaits: ⁤Exciting Outings and Tours for Military ‍Families Calling ​all military families stationed across Europe! Get ⁢ready for an unforgettable experience with a wealth of⁢ exciting outings ​and tours designed just‍ for you. Whether you crave snowy slopes, ‌historical explorations, or cultural immersions, ther’s something to ignite your wanderlust.‍
Skiing and Snowboarding Thrills Calling ⁣all ​snow bunnies and adrenaline junkies! Several locations offer fantastic ski​ and snowboarding opportunities. In Grafenwoehr, embrace​ the slopes with a trip to Nebelhorn (Feb ⁢15-16) or Juwel Alpenbachtal (Feb 22) ‌for ⁣an exhilarating experience. For a taste of Austrian charm, set your sights on Zillerbachtal (March⁤ 15) and enjoy breathtaking views alongside the thrill of the slopes.
Unforgettable Cultural Adventures Immerse yourselves in the rich tapestry of European culture with captivating tours. Kaiserslautern boasts ⁢a⁣ range of exciting itineraries. Embark on a mesmerizing journey to Iceland (Feb 13-17) to⁤ witness the island’s dramatic landscapes and unique culture. Alternatively,​ delve into history‍ during a poignant‍ visit to Krakow and Auschwitz (Feb 13-17).​ For⁤ a touch of Irish charm, join Paddy’s Week in‍ Ireland‍ (March 15-23) and soak in the vibrant atmosphere.
Celebrating Together: Valentine’s Day​ and Christmas “There’s magic in the air,” says RTT Travel Ramstein, inviting families to create lasting memories.⁣ Indulge in a romantic Arctic adventure (Feb 14-17), ‌embrace the festive spirit with a⁢ Christmas ‍Grand Slam (Dec 20-22),‌ or embark on‌ an Epic European Capitals journey to Ljubljana and Zagreb (March‌ 30-April 4). For a special‌ Valentine’s Day treat, enjoy a Swiss Valentine trip (Feb 15) or⁣ a candy-coated Cologne adventure (March 8).
Discovering Local adventures Looking for something closer‌ to home? Explore the outdoors with outings organized by local recreational facilities. Learn essential bushcraft​ skills in Stuttgart (Feb 8) or visit the spring flea market (March 15). ‌Wiesbaden ‍offers a unique opportunity to brush up on⁢ your shooting knowledge with their US forces​ sports shooting knowledge course (Jan 23). ‌
Ready for an adventure? Explore These Unforgettable Experiences Calling all thrill-seekers and culture enthusiasts! Get ready‍ to embark on unforgettable journeys with⁢ these exciting trips and tours. From breathtaking natural landscapes to captivating historical sites, ⁣there’s something for everyone to enjoy.
For the outdoor adventurer, a ski and snowboard trip to Granada from February 14th to 17th promises ‍exhilarating slopes and stunning mountain views. immerse yourself​ in the beauty of nature ‌with a⁢ hike through the Grazalema Natural Park on February 22nd,or challenge yourself with a mountain bike ride in Pinar de la ⁤Algaida on March 1st.
History buffs will be captivated by the Nerja Caves and Frigiliana historical ⁤tour on February ⁤1st,offering⁢ a glimpse into the region’s ​rich past. Alternatively, delve into the grandeur of ⁣the San Marcos castle and bullring on February⁢ 22nd, where you can witness the legacy of Spain’s vibrant culture. ‌
Looking for a unique ⁤experience? Embark on a thrilling ⁢canyon descent on March 22nd,or explore the majestic Grazalema park on March 29th. And for a truly romantic getaway, treat yourself to a special Valentine’s Day Arabian⁣ bath and dinner on February ⁣15th.
For those seeking culinary delights, a foodie tour featuring Jamon Iberico on January 25th⁢ promises a tantalizing taste of Spain’s renowned cuisine.
Ready to plan your next adventure?⁣ Contact Outdoor Recreation (ODR) at DSN 727-3101 or CIV 095682-3101/3208, or ⁤reach out to Tickets and Travel at DSN 727-3101/3208 or CIV 095682-3101/3208.

author: Poster
title: Dark Hawk Pro Drone: Your Ticket To Aerial Excellence
text:
IntroductionThe Dark Hawk Pro Drone is an advanced aerial device that has gained significant popularity in recent years. In this report, we will provide a comprehensive analysis of its price, its features, and its value for money.
Dark Hawk Pro Drone PriceThe Dark Hawk Pro Drone is available in the market at a price of $699.99. While this might seem relatively expensive compared to other drones available, it is essential to understand the features and Dark Hawk Pro Drone specifications that come along with this device before assessing its value for money. Features and SpecificationsThe Dark Hawk Pro Drone boasts an array of features that make it stand out from its competitors. Firstly, it has a 4K ultra-high-definition camera that captures excellent footage and photographs with impeccable clarity. This camera is complemented by a three-axis gimbal system, ensuring stable and smooth footage even in challenging conditions. Additionally, the drone is equipped with a 5 GHz transmission system, enabling live streaming of high-quality videos directly to the user's smartphone or compatible device.Another standout feature of the Dark Hawk Pro Drone is its extended flight time. With a powerful battery, this drone can fly for up to 30 minutes continuously, allowing users to capture extensive aerial footage without interruptions. Moreover, it has an impressive range of up to 2.5 kilometers, providing ample opportunities for exploration and capturing breathtaking shots from afar.The Dark Hawk Pro Drone also has several intelligent flight modes, such as Follow Me, Waypoint Navigation, and Point of Interest. These features enable the drone to autonomously follow a subject, navigate along specified waypoints, and circle around a specific point of interest, respectively. Such functionalities enhance the user experience by allowing them to focus on capturing stunning imagery rather than maneuvering the drone manually.Value for MoneyConsidering the Dark Hawk Pro Drone's price, it is crucial to evaluate its value for money. Comparing it to other drones in the market, the Dark Hawk Pro Drone offers a compelling combination of features, specifications, and performance. Its 4K camera, extended flight time, long-range, and intelligent flight modes justify its relatively higher price.Moreover, the Dark Hawk Pro Drone is built with durable materials, making it highly resistant to damages caused by crashes or heavy winds. This robust construction contributes to its longevity, ensuring that users can enjoy their investment for an extended period.In terms of customer reviews, the Dark Hawk Pro Drone has received overwhelmingly positive feedback. Users praise its stable flight capabilities, clear camera footage, and ease of use. Some enthusiasts have even compared its performance to drones that are priced significantly higher, stating that the Dark Hawk Pro Drone offers remarkable value for its cost.ConclusionIn conclusion, the Dark Hawk Pro Drone is an advanced aerial device that justifies its price through its extensive range of features and high-quality performance. It offers users the ability to capture stunning aerial footage and photographs with its 4K camera, stable flight capabilities, and intelligent flight modes. While it may be relatively expensive compared to other drones on the market, its impeccable reputation and value for money make it a wise investment for both professional photographers and drone enthusiasts alike.
IntroductionThe Dark Hawk Pro Drone is an advanced aerial device that has gained significant popularity in recent years. In this report, we will provide a comprehensive analysis of its price, its features, and its value for money.

author: @Onzemondial
title: Liverpool - Leicester : les Reds reversent les Foxes dans le brouillard épais d'Anfield !
text:
Liverpool - Leicester : les Reds reversent les Foxes dans le brouillard épais d'Anfield !
Ce soir, Liverpool a renversé Leicester et continue d'assoir sa domination sur la Premier League.
Ce soir, Liverpool a renversé Leicester et continue d'assoir sa domination sur la Premier League.
La régularité à tout niveau. Ce soir, Liverpool a renversé Leicester au terme d'un match mal embarqué par les Reds. En effet, l'ancien de l'Olympique de Marseille, Jordan Ayew, a rapidement ouvert le score (6ᵉ) dans l'épais brouillard d'Anfield. Un but sublime sur une passe décisive de Stephy Mavididi. Mais cette saison, l'armée d'Arne Slot est tout simplement injouable. Juste avant de retourner au vestiaire, Cody Gakpo est venu nettoyer la lucarne de Jakub Stolarczyk d'une magnifique enroulée. Une bien bonne manière de clôturer ce premier acte.
Mais dès le coup de sifflet de la seconde période, Liverpool est reparti tambour battant. Et c'est le jeune Curtis Jones, qui, sur une action d'école, est venu redonner l'avantage aux Reds. Anfield explose. Plus tard dans la partie, Cody Gakpo était proche d'un doublé, mais son but a été refusé pour hors-jeu. Mais que serait un match sans un but de Mohamed Salah ? L'international égyptien est venu cloturer le festival offensif des siens en inscrivant son 16ᵉ but de la saison en championnat.
Ainsi, les hommes d'Arne Slot profitent du faux-pas de Chelsea face à Fulham pour prendre sept points d'avance sur les Blues. Cette saison, les Reds sont intouchables en Premier League, mais aussi pour l'heure en Ligue des Champions. Vers un doublé fou à la fin de la saison ?
Liverpool continue d'assoir sa domination sur la Premier League. En effet, les hommes d'Arne Slot ont renversé Leicester. Pourtant, ce sont les Foxes qui avaient ouvert le score grâce à Jordan Ayew. Mais c'était sans compter sur le réveil de Cody Gakpo, Curtis Jones et Mohamed Salah.(3-1).

author: @playbill
title: Photos: Get a 1st Look at Kate Mulgrew in Off-Broadway's The Beacon | Playbill
text: Stage and screen star [Kate Mulgrew](https://playbill.com/person/kate-mulgrew-vault- 48007) (Orange Is the New Black, Equus, Ryan's Hope, Star Trek: Voyager, Tea at Five) heads the cast of [Irish Repertory Theatre](https://playbill.com/venue/irish-repertory-theatre-coms- 35022)'s production of Nancy Harris' [The Beacon](https://playbill.com/production/the-beacon-off-broadway-irish-repertory-theatre-2024), which began previews September 11. Directed by Marc Atkinson Borrull, the production will officially open September 22 for a limited engagement through November 3 on Irish Rep’s Francis J. Greenburger Mainstage. Mulgrew is joined by [Zach Appelman](https://playbill.com/person/zach-appelman-vault-0000117053) (War Horse) as Colm, Sean Bell (Harmony) as Donal, [David Mattar Merten](https://playbill.com/person/david-mattar-merten) (An Enemy of the People) as Ray, and Ayana Workman (Rustin) as Bonnie. Get a first look at the production in the photo gallery below: Mulgrew plays Beiv, a renowned artist who has left her suburban Dublin home for a cottage off the coast of West Cork, Ireland. Her relative peace is disrupted when her estranged son, Colm, returns home with his new wife, searching for answers about his father’s mysterious death. The production also features set design by Colm McNally, costume design by [Orla Long](https://playbill.com/person/orla-long-designer), lighting design by McNally, sound design by Liam Bellman-Sharpe, and properties by Nicole Rozanski. Pam Brusoski is the production stage manager, Karen Evanouskas is the assistant stage manager, [Jane Guyer Fujita](https://playbill.com/person/jane-guyer-fujita) is the dialect coach, and [Rick Sordelet](https://playbill.com/person/rick-sordelet-vault- 603) is the fight director. Casting is by [Geoff Josselson](https://playbill.com/person/geoff-josselson-vault-0000125137).
